page.title: 20HEAGE CARNIVAL
page.content: The Carnival takes place in June and was revived nine years ago.I look forward to it.After assembly and judging of floats the band heads the parade around the village to the school field.Each year has a special event.This year it was a circus with a trapeze artist,clowns,dogs,ponies, llama,bear performing in the ring. There were various stalls and raffles.The band played in the ring before the circus.A village girl was chosen earlier at a disco,to be carnival queen for the day with four attendants.It involves all the village organisations with inter-club and pub competitions. WELL DRESSING. "Preserving the Past" was the second annual Well Dressing at Brook Street.Flower petals,bark,seeds, and leaves fixed on a bed of clay depicted Crich Tram Museum.
